name: Kristine
description: Teacher Kristine is an instructor in SEED. Even the Ten Saints call her Teacher. She has trained numerous elites who are on the front line of defense against Nightmares.

passiveSkill.name: Commander's Medal
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "Attack when the enemy least expected it to turn the tide of a battle. When Kristine joins the battle, summons a random allied Guardian to the front column."}

uniqueSkill.name: Commander's Tactic
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "An outstanding commander is decisive and knows their army. Kristine deals ATK * {placeholder} damage to a single enemy. When an allied Guardian is present, increases damage by {placeholder}."}

specialSkill.name: Commander's Strategy
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Kristine launches a fierce attack, dealing ATK * {placeholder} damage to a single enemy. When an allied Guardian is present, increases damage by {placeholder}.Skill Cast Rate: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Commander's Operation
normalSkill.description: Kristine deals ATK * {placeholder} damage to a single enemy.

templateData.lens4.skill: An outstanding commander is decisive and knows their army. Kristine deals ATK * {placeholder} damage to a single enemy. When an allied Guardian is present, increases damage by {placeholder}.
templateData.lens5.skill: Attack when the enemy least expected it to turn the tide of a battle. When Kristine joins the battle, summons a random allied Guardian to the front column.
templateData.lens6.skill: Kristine launches a fierce attack, dealing ATK * {placeholder} damage to a single enemy. When an allied Guardian is present, increases damage by {placeholder}.Skill Cast Rate: {placeholder}
